item.description:
Come join us at our first annual Summer meet and greet for some great geek conversation, food, drinks and fun! There is no better way to get started into Summer than with great company and food. All food and supplies will be provided by us, so just bring your appetite.

More information will follow regarding location, logistics and additional details.

group.name: The Boston Computing Review Meetup Group

item.name: Geekout BBQ!
